cards.title: Cabin Simulator
cards.desc: Designed for cabin crew training, this application simulates standard operation procedures of opening and closing emergency exit door on airplanes.

cards.title: Robotic Arm and Gripper Tele-Operation System (RAGTOS)
cards.desc: RAGTOS allows users to synchronize their hands with robotics arm and gripper remotely, and simultaneously feel the force feedback of objects that the gripper grasps.

cards.title: SOP Training in High Risk Environments
cards.desc: In digitilized high risk environments (e.g. high radiation area), trainees can practice standard operation procedures safely and efficiently.

cards.title: Professional and Vocational Training
cards.desc: VR vocatioanl training courses are offered to people working in various career fields to improve their skills in digitalized workplaces such as assembly line, manufacturing plants and power plants.

cards.title: Surgeon Simulator
cards.desc: Surgeon Simulator gives medical students/trainees a "hands-on" experience of human anatomy and cardiac surgery

cards.title: Sanctum Escape
cards.desc: A fully immersive VR escape-room experience, solving a series of puzzles and riddles to escape the sanctum using your hands and wits.

cards.title: The Vacant House
cards.desc: A "hands-on" interactive thriller, using your hands to explore the vacant house, finding clues and hints and run for your life.

cards.title: Toybricks VR
cards.desc: Using the control panel with levers, knobs and buttons to get the toybricks you need, building your own house, tank and bridge.

cards.title: Space Education
cards.desc: Immersing yourself in a fascinating universe of satellites, rockets and chemical elements, interacting with them using your own hands

cards.title: Take it Apart VR
cards.desc: Roll up your sleeves! A hands-on experience of dismantling furnatures and vehicles

cards.title: Nvidia Holodeck
cards.desc: Designing and modeling was never this easy! Prototyping with VR mock-ups and collaberating with your team across locations virtually.
